run() - Method in class client.net.ClientPing
This threaded method pings the provided ip address in a regular interval and stores the duration.
run() - Method in class client.net.Receiver
This threaded method handles the input a user receives from the connection.
run() - Method in class client.net.Sender
This threaded method handles the output respectively a Chat message from the client.
run() - Method in class server.net.Connection
This threaded method handles all input and output from/to a player socket, providing information such as message, name and time.
run() - Method in class server.net.Server
This method is always listening for connections onto the server socket, creates object of it and adds them to the list of connected players followed by calling the run() method of a newly created object.
run() - Method in class server.net.ServerPing
This threaded method constantly sends the ping to the connected clients using their ip-address and saves the time when the ping is sent.
